MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL39 postcode area of Arthog, affecting properties in Mawddach Street and surrounding area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11 AM due to urgent repair needed to a Pole that is leaning. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 1 PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:15 AM on 6th November 2020.
